      private void initHUD(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Creates an overlaying stage for HUD elements. Added upon via addHUDActor(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor).
      Parameters:
      batch - The batch to use for the HUD stage.

      public void addHUDActor(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor)
      Adds an actor to the HUD stage which overlays the base stage.
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor to be added to the HUD stage.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the HUD stage is not initialized.

    • removeActor

      Parameters:

    • getMouseQuadrant

      public int getMouseQuadrant(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 mousePos)
      Returns the quadrant in which the mouse position is located relative to the center of the stage. The quadrant is represented by Align constants corner constants. These are Align.topLeft, Align.topRight, Align.bottomLeft and Align.bottomRight.
      Parameters:
      mousePos - The position of the mouse.
      Returns:
      The quadrant in which the mouse position is located.
